[CR]Choose from 25 premade popular rhythm patterns --from Afro-Cuban to Waltz-- or create your own.[CR]Speed up any rhythm, slow it down, or even change the meter, all while the Rhythm Maker plays.[CR]Review the combinations and save the ones you like, [CR]Add punch to any song or dance tune, with Rhythm Maker.

game.name: Richard Scarry's Best Neighborhood
game.plot: [I]Richard Scarry's Best Neighborhood Disc Ever![/I] is an edutainment title for children based on a book by Richard Scarry. In the game players explore Busytown, a fictional place where there's always a lot going on. The whole town comes to life in cartoon animations. Players choose places and characters to visit. At these places players can practice and learn important pre-reading skills and listen to stories. Taught skills include memory, color recognition, vocabulary, pattern recognition and counting.

game.name: Richard Scarry's Busiest Neighborhood
game.plot: [I]Richard Scarry's Busiest Neighborhood Disc Ever![/I] is an edutainment title for young children that is based on a book by Richard Scarry. In the game players can explore Busytown's shops and offices. All around town they will encounter familiar characters created by Scarry. There are various games to be played, such as a visual memory game in which you have to recreate an ice cream recipe. The player also learns what he or she can expect to see and find in various locations such as a doctor's office as well as more fundamental skills such as recognizing the weather, patterns and sounds and matching up shapes.

game.name: Rise of the Robots
game.plot: Electrocorp, the world's leading manufacturer and developer of advanced robotics ran the Leader Project to develop a multi-task, ultra-intelligent, self-aware robot to manage every aspect of the factory plant. The end result was the Supervisor Droid, a machine capable of assuming any form and accessing any database. But when an EGO virus infected the Supervisor's self-awareness it started to consider its need above of those of the company, infecting the other robots in the plant and declaring itself their leader. Electrocorp then sent its top-secret ECO32-5 Cyborg to infiltrate the plant and destroy the supervisor.[CR]Rise of the Robots is a versus fighting game. The player controls the ECO32-5 Cyborg and must fight all the other robots in the plant until finally meeting the Supervisor Droid. The controls consist of 3 buttons for punches and 3 buttons for kicks (one for each in the Game Gear version), and jumping, moving, crouching and blocking are performed with the directional pad. The Cyborg has two super moves, the Turbo Head Butt and the Shoulder Barge. The player can choose the difficulty, number of rounds and time limit for the fights, as well as turn turn the super moves off.[CR]The game has three modes: mission, where the player fights each robot in a fixed order; training, where the player can fight any robot in any desired order; and two players versus mode (absent in the Game Gear version), where the second player chooses any of the enemy robots to fight with. It features an AI system that reacts to the player style, 3D rendered cutscenes and the title song was composed by Queen's guitarist Brian May.
game.groups: Rise of the Robots series,Visual technique / style: Digitized sprites

game.name: Sandy's Circus Adventure
game.plot: Sandy's Circus Adventure is a children's title about a friendly sea lion called Sandy. Sandy is lost in the circus and together with the player she will explore it. Sandy can have fun with the clowns, be launched out of a giant cannon, disappear inside a magician's hat, juggle and much more circus related activities. Every activity is accompanied with cartoon animations and digital music and sound effects. Furthermore there are some more active and creative activities such as color drawings, creating short animations and creating clowns faces by making combinations of facial features.

game.name: Santa Claus' Mice

rom.name: mame-software-list-chds-2/cdi/santamic/santa claus' mice (1992)(philips)(eu)(en-fr)[les souris du pere noel].chd

game.plot: [I]Santa Claus' Mice[/I] is an audio book with activities and games for children of ages 3 to 7. The story is about a mouse who works for Santa Claus. The text can be displayed while it is pronounced for early readers to learn the words.[CR]Aside from the story itself there's also games to be played. Parents can select games of an appropriate age level for their children. There are five games to be played, but they are all pretty much similar. In each game a series of questions is asked. The player can click on a picture which represents a scene, person, animal or item from the game to select his or her answer. Some questions are about the content of the game. Others ask for the opinion of the player (for example: "During which part of the story would you have been most frightened if you were the main character?") There's no wrong answer in these cases.[CR]The game is part of the Storybook Adventures series and features the exact same interface as the other titles in the series: a magic bookmark that turns into a wizard as your guide.

game.name: Sargon Chess
game.plot: Sargon Chess is a chess engine inspired by the Mesopotamian king Sargon that allows you to play a game of chess.[CR]The game features 16 different difficulty levels. A special Novice level gives you starter tips and allows you to take back moves and changes sides. It is also possible to construct Chess challenges and let "Sargon" solve them.[CR]The game can be played with 3 distinct chess sets which are displayed in a quasi-3D perspective.

game.name: Scotland Yard Interactive
game.plot: Scotland Yard Interactive is a digital version of the board game Scotland Yard by Ravensburger. Mr. X is London's most wanted criminal and it's up to the players to catch him.[CR]In the game each turn players try to chase down Mr. X. Players have tokens for use of taxis, buses and the tube. But when the tokens run out the funding for the hunt is up and Mr. X. goes free. Mr. X. receives all used tokens and thus it becomes easier for him to travel throughout the game. But as a clue to the other players he must show which token he uses each turn. Mr. X. has a limited number of black tokens which could stand for any means of transportation. At five specific times during the game, Mr. X. has to reveal his current position. The detectives win when they land on the same square as Mr. X. Mr. X. wins when all tokens are spend up.[CR]This digital conversion features photographs and digital animations of London. The game can be played with up to six players and both Mr. X. and the detectives can be A.I. controlled.

game.name: Secret Mission
game.plot: It's the 1950's. The place is the Indo-Chinese country of Opalia. Opalia has become the target of the USSR and the United States and its geographic position has made it a real hot spot in the Cold War battle of the superpowers. Networks of underground informants and foreign spies have totally destabilized this once peaceful country and local rebels, led by the devious Prime Minister, Vishaka, are trying to topple the king. The safety of Opalia is in your hands alone... you can't let them down!

game.name: Shaolin's Road
game.plot: Shaolin's Road is a action adventure that takes place in medieval China. When Tsu Yu's father, a powerful warlord, is murdered and his sword stolen, Tsu Yu vows to avenge his father's murder. The player (as Tsu Yu) will have to learn Shaolin Kung Fu to do so. [CR]The player has to roam the land and speak with other Kung Fu heroes, who will most likely only scoff at the player. Occasionally they will send the player on a trial which comes in the form of a mini game, such as shooting a snake with a bow and arrow, engaging in Kung Fu fighting and karate, throwing stars, performing calligraphy and playing memory to learn Chinese symbols. [CR]Completing challenges changes the color of the player's belt and gives him more recognition with the other fighters allowing him to progress further. It also unlocks new pieces of the map you can use to travel to new areas.

game.name: Shipwreck
game.plot: [I]Shipwreck[/I] is an educational title about electricity and magnetism for children of 8 years and older. In this game children learn the principles, terms and practical applications of electricity. The game is based on the educational children's books by Two-Can Publishing.[CR]In the main game the player is shipwrecked on an island and has to repair a broken motorboat in order to escape from the evil clutches of "Ohm". The player will have to put all his knowledge of electricity to good use to succeed.

game.name: Soundtrap
game.plot: Soundtrap is an educational title about sound for children of 8 years and older. In this game children learn the principles, terms and practical applications of sound. The game is based on the educational children's books by Two-Can Publishing.[CR]After a series of interactive lessons, the player can have a go at the main game: An adventure game in which the player has to apply his knew knowledge to the test.

game.name: Space Ace
game.plot: The evil commander Borf has kidnapped Ace's girlfriend, the beautiful Kimberly, and is plotting to enslave the Earth using his dreaded "Infanto Ray", a weapon that changes everyone it blasts into a helpless baby. Armed with only a laser gun, Ace must find and destroy the Infanto Ray, rescue Kimberly and save the Earth. All in a day's work for a superhero, right? Featuring full screen animation and crisp, powerful sound from the original laser disc arcade classic, Space Ace delivers arcade action at its most addictive!
game.groups: Don Bluth / Readysoft interactive movies,Gameplay feature: Quick Time Events / QTEs,Games made into TV series,Games made into comics,Space Ace series

game.name: Sport Freaks
game.plot: Sport Freaks is a sports quiz game based on a Dutch television game show of the same name. The game includes all the questions that were written for the show but were never used. All the questions relate to a selection of 45 sports in 50 countries since the year 1900. The number of questions in the game (1250) equals 60 game show episodes. Using a sort of slot machine each turn a sport, year and country is chosen which you receive a question about. The emphasis lies on Dutch sports history.

game.name: Stickybear: Family Fun - Games
game.plot: [I]Stickybear: Family Fun - Games[/I] is a children's title based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. Unlike other Stickybear licensees which are more educative in character this game is all about having fun.[CR]The game offers a variety of mini-games such as [I]Hangman[/I], [I]Tic Tac Toe[/I] and [I]Hippity Hop[/I], a peg jumping game. All the games are accompanied with familiar Stickybear characters which are fully animated and accompanied with amusing sound effects.
game.groups: Animals: Bears / Pandas,Hangman games,Stickybear licensees,Tic-Tac-Toe games

game.name: Stickybear Math
game.plot: Now kids can practice basic math skills and help the Stickybear family out of some sticky jams at the same time. It's simple - for every set of addition and subtraction problems youngsters get right, Stickybear gets a step closer to getting out of a jam.[CR]Get enough problems right and Stickybear gets out of one jam... but into another...[CR]And kids practice skills at a pace that's just right for them... because Stickybear Math, the computer automatically advances when the child is ready to try another skill level. Adults can choose a child's starting level. So, horizontal or vertical problems, single-digit or four-digit, carrying or borrowing, kids are ready for them!

game.name: Stickybear Preschool
game.plot: Stickybear: Preschool is an educational title for children ages three through six, based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. In this game players learn and improve basic skills such as recognizing shapes or opposites, learning the alphabet and counting and grouping items and colors. Each of the simple games is accompanied with cartoon animations and sound effects of Stickybear and his friends. The game is bilingual in English and Spanish.

game.name: Stickybear Reading
game.plot: Stickybear: Reading is an educational title for children ages four to eight, based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. The game features three different reading activities, all accompanied with cartoon animations, music and comical sound effects.[CR]Using the Sentence Builder players can create their own sentences from nouns and verbs, which will be read out loud by Stickybear. Each sentence features an animation. In Sarah's Word Book players can click on items which then animate, their names are said and displayed textually. Finally in Word Bop, players use a magical cannon that turns items into words and vice versa. The game features both the English and Spanish language to play in.

game.name: Striker Pro
game.plot: Striker Pro is a soccer game for the CD-i. The game has a top-down view with the goals at the top and bottom of the playing field. In the game you can choose from 64 national teams to play with. There are various game modes such as friendly, world league and world cup. Optionally the game can be played in a 6 vs 6 mode. The game can be played against the AI or another player.

game.name: Surf City
game.plot: Surf City is an interactive musical with songs from the Beach Boys. [CR]In the game the player is presented with an overview map of the beach town aptly named Surf City. The player can click on various streets, which triggers a scene where the street scrolls by and the player can click on the various buildings he wants to visit. Inside the building the player can talk to people and interact with items. The scenes are accompanied with Beach Boys music from the 60s and help tell the story of the main characters of the game.[CR]There's various games and activities to be played as well such as:[CR]Build a hot rod[CR]Go bowling at the Beach Bowl[CR]Design a surfboard[CR]Play the video jukebox[CR]Race cars at the arcade speedway[CR]Take a pizza order[CR]Learn surf lingo from Tiki[CR]Visit the love teller[CR]Take a pop quiz at the high school[CR]Watch fireworks on the pier[CR]Order a burger-to-go[CR]Play spin-the-bottle at Wendy's house

game.name: Tangram: The Ultimate Chinese Game
game.plot: CD-I makes Tangram more challenging, more exciting. There are more symbols, more silhouettes, so you can develop greater skills. Just use the cursor to rotate and move the pieces. Choose free expression or tackle set tasks. And choose your own level of play: beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert - up to the highest level of all. Free Form Tangram on CD-I means moving forms, mood music, and much more fun!

game.name: Tell Me Why One
game.plot: Tell Me Why One is an interactive trivia game. There are over 175 questions that need answering. Questions in the game are typical questions that curious children might ask. They come in five categories: our world, how things work, the zoo, how things began and the human body. Questions are supported with audio and visuals. The game comes with over 3 hours of fact filled presentations and interactive exhibits.

game.name: Tell Me Why Two
game.plot: Tell Me Why Two is an interactive trivia game and sequel to Tell Me Why One. The game comes with an additional 175+ questions that need answering. Questions in the game are typical questions that curious children might ask. They come in five categories: our world, how things work, the zoo, how things began and the human body. Questions are supported with audio and visuals. The game comes with over 3 hours of fact filled presentations and interactive exhibits.

game.name: Tetris
game.plot: Tetris... a classic game in a class of its own. Originally conceived by Alexey Pazhitnov and designed by Vadim Gerasimov of the former USSR, Tetris is recognized all over the world for its elegant simplicity and challenging game play.[CR]Tetris CD-i is the ultimate Tetris experience. Spectacular video nature scenes and an original CD score by Jim Andron complement classic Tetris game play and elevate this phenomenon to new heights. In CD-i, the classic becomes a legend.[CR]You-ll find Tetris CD-i irresistibly addicting as you try to rotate and flip moving pieces to fit into a solid line at the bottom of the playing field. Remove ten lines and you move on to the next level! Discover what game players all over the world have learned...this is one addiction you can't live without.[CR]- Original Tetris Game Play features[CR]- Ten levels of play[CR]- Spectacular motion video nature backgrounds[CR]- Ten original CD soundtracks

game.name: Tetsuo Gaiden
game.plot: Tetsuo Gaiden, a fantasy flight through the realms of alien darkness. Featuring the best CD-i has got to offer; amazing 3D full motion video, riveting gameplay and a smack in your face soundtrack...[CR]Prepare for more than 80 blazing levels filled with the best and fastest gameplay ever created on CD-i. Brought to you by the award-winning team from Christmas Country, Tetsuo Gaiden is jampacked with nice features like bonus items, multiple laser fire, smartbombs, energy shields and super bonusses.[CR]Get ready for the best game of spring '97.

game.name: Text Tiles
game.plot: Text Tiles is a strategic puzzle game in which players have to spell words. Using a set of given letters the players have to form words, much like Scrabble. This is done on a 12x12 board. The letters can be used to either form a long word or multiple short words. Points are scored for each correct word. Letters are received one at a time and disappear again after a certain amount of time creating a time pressure for forming words. The player can see what his next letter is going to be so he can plan ahead. The game can be played with up to four players.

game.name: The Apprentice
game.plot: Poor Marvin needs your help! As apprentice to the great wizard Gandorf S. Wandburner III, Marvin must perform treacherous tasks throughout the castle towers. Take control of the apprentice and guide him through six heart-stopping levels in the arcade-style platform game that delivers fast, furious play with thousands of frames of animation. You'll be running, jumping, flying, even swimming your way around the towers, working against the clock and all the beastly enemies who are eager to prove that a wizard's work is never done!

game.name: Thumbelina
game.plot: [I]Thumbelina[/I] is an interactive telling of the story by Hans Christian Andersen. It features video fragments and stills from the cartoon film by Don Bluth. As the story is told images are show in the background. Many of these images include activities. These activities include coloring, starting animations through clicking on hot-spots and simple puzzles like counting objects and moving shapes to the correct sockets with the cursor.[CR]Colored images start to animate once they are filled in. The whole story is divided into seven chapters, so that it is possible to skip to the activities you want to play, or continue the story at a different time.

game.name: Thunder in Paradise
game.plot: Here's your shot at Paradise, bro. You're in the middle of an action-packed adventure with your cohorts Spence (Terry "Hulk" Hogan) and Bru (Chris Lemmon). Blast your way through these mind-blowing action encounters as you attempt to rescue Spence's daughter Jessica, regain control of the M.A.J.O.R., and crush your arch enemy, RAMPIKE! Race at hyperspeed through the Caribbean, aboard THUNDER, a 45-foot piece of hi-tech marine hardware. Take control of the boat's weapon systems and defend THUNDER from a shower of deadly threats. Face down minions of the psychotic RAMPIKE on the eerie trails of Rossiter's Island. Go toe-to-toe with the M.A.J.O.R., a bio-humanoid gone haywire, in a battle for Jessica's life!
game.groups: Genre: Light Gun Shooter,Inspiration: TV series

game.name: Titanic An Interactive Exploration
game.plot: Titanic: An Interactive Exploration was essentially an interactive documentary released for Phillip's illfated CDI platform.

game.name: Treasures of the Smithsonian
game.plot: Explore the highlights of a dozen museums in this unique, interactive compact disc! From the Air and Space Museum to the National Zoo, treasures range from the World War 1 Albatross Fighter Plane to Zande Harp from Africa. Along the way, you’ll find everything from the Hope Diamonds to Howdy Doody. From Lincoln’s Last Photograph to the famous Pandas. Art works by Picasso and Pollock a Stradivari Cello and a pair of Washington’s Teeth. You can browse through the treasures by museum, category, date or theme. Popular columnist Edward Park provides interesting commentary. Special features let you walk around an object, play its sounds or zoom in on it.

game.name: The Ultimate Noah's Ark
game.plot: The Ultimate Noah's Ark is a digital version of the picture-book of the same name by artist Mike Wilks. Like the book the player is presented with a large drawing of Noah's Ark. On the Ark are 354 different animal species to be found. All but one of them have a mate. It's up to the user to find which animal is missing his mate.[CR]The original drawing can be broken up into 256 different screen-wide detail close-ups. In addition to the drawing this software title comes with additional information for all the animals including videos of them in their natural habitats.

game.name: Ultra CDi Soccer
game.plot: Ultra CD-i Soccer is a top-down soccer game. The game features 72 European teams to play with against the computer or a friend. The game allows the player to play a total competition with all the teams, and to create his own competition with up to four teams.

game.name: USA '94 World Cup
game.plot: USA 94 World Cup, a fantastic way to make the most of the worlds most popular sports tournament: The Football World Cup. This CD-i takes you through the United States, provides you with detailed information about teams, coaches and stadiums and allows you to rate scores! A unique way to follow the matches closely and build your own memories of the 1994 World Cup!

game.name: Vegas Girls
game.plot: Vegas Girls offers the players to play all kinds of casino games such as roulette, blackjack, poker, dice and slot machines. Each of the games is played using the familiar rules of the games, but in strip-poker style. This means the player plays against a virtual female who will lose a piece of clothing every time the player wins. There are various girls to play against.

game.name: Video GP Speedway
game.plot: [I]Video Speedway[/I] is a racing game for the CD-i. The game is presented in a first person view from inside the fictional Formula One racing cars. Before each race the player has to run a trial lap on the track. Different tracks have different backgrounds such as the sky lines of New York, Paris, Geneva, Monument Valley and London.

game.name: Video Speedway: The Ultimate Racing Experience
game.description: Video Speedway: The Ultimate Racing Experience
game.plot: Welcome to life in the fast lane, heart pounding competition in high performance racing machines! You’re at the wheel. Advancing through ten of the world’s toughest professional race tracks. Jump start your career with Kart finals, accelerate to Formula 3000 competition, and take the lead with Formula 1 championships! You are up to three other drivers must sharpen your skills, knowledge and equipment to compete against eight opponents on each track. Consult with a real pit mechanic for advice on fine tuning your car.

game.name: Voyeur ...don't get caught (USA)
game.plot: Don’t get caught...[CR]Reed Hawke has it all, wealth, power, the adoration of millions, and secrets to protect. This weekend he has gathered his family to discuss his running for the presidency of the United States. Lust, revenge and betrayal are at play in this adult political thriller.[CR]Do you just watch… or risk geting involved? Will the videotape you make save the country or cost you your life? As the Voyeur, its up to you.

game.name: Voyeur II
game.plot: Voyeur II is the sequel to the game Voyeur made by Philips Media and Interweave Entertainment made only for MS-DOS and Windows 3.1 PC's and released in 1996 starring Dennis Weaver.

game.name: The Wacky World of Miniature Golf - with Eugene Levy
game.description: The Wacky World of Miniature Golf - with Eugene Levy

rom.name: mame-software-list-chds-2/cdi/wackyglf/wacky world of minature golf, the - with eugene levy (1993)(philips)(eu).chd

game.plot: In The Wacky World of Miniature Golf, the player can pick from a bevy of cartoon golfers and compete in 18 holes of miniature putt-putt golf in a variety of cartoon fantasy settings such as Egypt, prehistoric times, Atlantis, a prison and many more. The gameplay is more of an interactive cartoon where the player chooses the direction they wish to hit the ball and pressing the action button. If the player has chosen correctly they will hit it successfully and be treated to a cutscene where the ball will avoid the various obstacles and landing in the hole. Choosing the wrong path, however, will have their ball destroyed by a variety of obstacles and force the player to retry again.[CR]A feature of the game is the voice acting talent of Eugene Levy who is most notable for his film appearances in the American Pie film series.

game.name: Whack A Bubble
game.plot: Whack a Bubble is a paddle and ball game in the vein of Breakout. You control a paddle at the bottom of the screen and have to remove bubbles at the top by bouncing a ball against them. If the ball leaves the screen at the bottom you loose a life.[CR]The game comes with a 100 levels and 3 difficulties. The game also features a two player mode where players play against each other.

game.name: Who Shot Johnny Rock?
game.plot: It's the rollicking 30's and someone has killed popular singer Johnny Rock in this action-packed gangster whodunit. The player will need to navigate the back streets, gaming halls, funeral parlors and the dirty sections of this city to get at the clues held by a number of shady characters and solve this murder mystery. Bad guys with machine guns provide a high level of shooting action.
game.groups: Genre: Light Gun Shooter,Live action cut-scenes

game.name: Wimbledon Challenge: The Official Wimbledon Quiz Game
game.description: Wimbledon Challenge: The Official Wimbledon Quiz Game

rom.name: mame-software-list-chds-2/cdi/wimbledn/wimbledon challenge - the official wimbledon quiz game (1993)(philips)(eu)(m6).chd

game.plot: Wimbledon Challenge is a multiple-choice tennis quiz game for two players or teams in one of six languages. Questions are asked randomly from a base of hundreds about the players, matches and life around the Championships

game.name: Wordplay
game.plot: Wordplay is a word game for up to four players. The virtual host Bob continuously presents new letters in a pool. Players select a letter to place in their own collection each turn. It is up to the players to create words with their collected letters. Forming words scores the players points, the first player to reach 200 points wins the match. Players score more points for words that use all of their letters. If a player can't make any words from the letters in the pool he or she can opt to reshuffle it completely but losing a turn. The game recognizes 35,000 words of both British and American spelling.

game.name: World Cup Golf: Hyatt Dorado Beach
game.description: World Cup Golf: Hyatt Dorado Beach
game.plot: World Cup Golf takes the player to Puerto Rico's own Hyatt Dorado Beach Golf Course as they can choose from a bevy of fictional golfers or create their own in 18 rounds of golf. There are 15 types of tournaments to choose from including skins, medal and stableford to name a few. Players can also practice their swing on the driving range.[CR]Players can also customize weather conditions as well as choose from a plethora of camera shots including the "Ball Cam" that follows the ball to its location. Like many golf games, a meter is used to determine the accuracy and the power of the players swing and also features in-game commentary.

game.name: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World
game.plot: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World is a multimedia piece by Peter Gabriel, made to promote his 1992 album, Us. It contains information about Gabriel himself, his record label and its artists, other projects, world music and more. The gaming elements include puzzles and treasure hunting.[CR]As the player completes puzzles and accomplishes goals new areas of the CD are unlocked featuring new content for the player to explore, including the ability to remix Peter Gabriel's music videos and joining in on jam sessions.

game.name: Yearn2Learn: Peanuts
game.plot: Yearn2Learn: Peanuts is edutainment software for kids aged 3 to 10, hosted by Snoopy and the Peanuts gang. It includes a series of independent activities such as a math game, a geography game, a reading game (which consists of animated Peanuts strips), a visual coordination game and an electronic coloring book. The game features full voice-overs explaining every feature in it and also spelling words and locations. Additionally, the game has many "hotspots" which trigger animations, sounds, etc.

game.name: De Zaak van Sam
game.plot: De Zaak van Sam is an interactive detective story. The player takes on the role of private detective Sam D. Philips who has been asked to find Monica. Monica is the beautiful wife of mafia boss Antonio Baresi.[CR]The game is an interactive movie in which the player has to make the right decisions or see an untimely end. The game takes its style from Film Noir Hollywood detectives from the 30s and 40s.

game.name: Zelda: The Wand of Gamelon
game.plot: When King Harkinian vanishes on a mission to save Gamelon, Link takes off to rescue him. But soon Link is also missing, and Zelda must free them both from their evil captors. This action adventure arcade-style game features 70 playfields, including palaces, forests, swamps, and a mysterious fairy pool. An awesome array of 90 amazing character will talk to you in full animation. Confront sword-wielding Stalfos, floating Ghini, dreaded Dodongos, pinching Gohma, and much more. You'll have a blast smashing your enemies into utter disgrace!

game.name: Zelda's Adventure
game.plot: As the brave warrior, Princess Zelda, it's your mission to thwart the enemy, Gannon, who has captured Link and taken over Tolemac. On the way to freeing Link, you'll journey deep into the Seven Shrines of the Underworld. You will acquire powerful weapons as you fight evil characters in your attempt to restore the Age of Lightness to this magical land.

game.name: Zenith
game.plot: Zenith is a pinball game. Controlling the flippers at the bottom of the machine the player has to keep the ball in play. There are many bonuses and specials to be gained such as extra balls, shields, fly mode and low gravity. The player must be on the lookout for acid that can destroy the ball. There are six levels and the game allows up to four players to compete.

game.name: Zombie Dinos From Planet Zeltoid
game.plot: Innocent dinosaurs have become mindless zombies, controlled by the evil Harry the Harrier and his alien Brain Blobs. But all is not lost. Wise-cracking Dexter the Dinodroid has managed to escape, bringing to Earth the incredible Time Machine. His goal: "Let's kick some brain!" Travel back in the Time Machine 200 million years. Locate each dinosaur before the Brain Blobs take control. Stop them from destroying unsuspecting humans in your hometown. Dexter will help you, along with the Time Machine's invaluable Dino Encyclopedia containing everything you need to know to save the planet.
